dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, are these International Property Awards actually... prestigious, or just, you know, a fancy party?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, are these International Property Awards actually... prestigious, or just, you know, a fancy party?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Prestigious? Um, honestly, I think it's just, uh, a massive PR exercise with a really good budget.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Prestigious? Um, honestly, I think it's just, uh, a massive P R exercise with a really good budget.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, come on. Three decades, The Savoy. Lord Thurso was presenting! That's, like, serious.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, come on. Three decades, The Savoy. Lord Thurso was presenting! That's, like, serious.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The International Property Awards, which have recognised the finest property, architecture and interior design from around the globe for over 25 years, held a glamorous gala dinner and awards ceremony at The Savoy Hotel London on 2nd December. The awards were presented by Lord Thurso, Chairman of the awards judging panel...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Lord Thurso. Sure. And Stuart Shield gives himself a pat on the back about "pushing boundaries." It's all self-congratulatory.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Lord Thurso. Sure. And Stuart Shield gives himself a pat on the back about pushing boundaries. It's all self-congratulatory.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The provided article does not contain the quote "pushing boundaries".

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But they had, what, 2,100 entries from 117 countries? You can't fake that kind of, um, global reach.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But they had, what, two thousand, one hundred entries from one hundred seventeen countries? You can't fake that kind of, um, global reach.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The projects were chosen from over 1900 entries from 114 countries and scrutinised by a judging committee...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Or maybe you can when you have 52 categories, Host_A. Fifty-two! That's, uh, one for every minor design choice.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or maybe you can when you have fifty two categories, Host_A. Fifty-two! That's, uh, one for every minor design choice.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Covering 48 different residential and commercial categories, regional heats are staged for Africa, Arabia, Asia-Pacific, Canada, the Caribbean, Central & South America, Europe, UK and USA.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, they had "85 global experts" and five UK Lords on the judging panel. That's a high bar.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, they had eighty five global experts and five U K Lords on the judging panel. That's a high bar.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...scrutinised by a judging committee which is chaired by four UK Lords and over 80 global experts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: "Global experts" means what, though? Someone's uncle who once bought a flat? And five Lords don't make it, like, legitimate.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Global experts means what, though? Someone's uncle who once bought a flat? And five Lords don't make it, like, legitimate.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It says the logo is "instantly recognized throughout the global property industry." That's impact.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It says the logo is instantly recognized throughout the global property industry. That's impact.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The award winners logo is an instantly-recognised symbol of excellence throughout the global property industry...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Instantly recognized by whom? The people who pay to enter? It's just a, uh, fancy sticker to put on your brochure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Instantly recognized by whom? The people who pay to enter? It's just a, uh, fancy sticker to put on your brochure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Stuart Shield literally said they demonstrate "innovation and pushing boundaries." This isn't just about sales.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Stuart Shield literally said they demonstrate innovation and pushing boundaries. This isn't just about sales.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The provided article does not contain the quote "innovation and pushing boundaries".

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's what every award show president says, Host_A. It's boilerplate. The "knowing glance" part just screams staged.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's what every award show president says, Host_A. It's boilerplate. The knowing glance part just screams staged.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Even the gala dinners â€“ Bangkok, London, Toronto. They're big productions. With, uh, a surprise soprano performance!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Even the gala dinners - Bangkok, London, Toronto. They're big productions. With, uh, a surprise soprano performance!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These have been celebrated at gala presentation events in Bangkok, London and Toronto during the course of the year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A soprano. Wow. That really, uh, confirms the profound architectural merit, doesn't it? Seriously.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A soprano. Wow. That really, uh, confirms the profound architectural merit, doesn't it? Seriously.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So you're saying all these winners, these "Worlds Best" entries, they mean nothing? Zero?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So you're saying all these winners, these Worlds Best entries, they mean nothing? Zero?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I'm saying it's, like, an echo chamber. Designed to make a few people feel very important and, um, sell more entries next year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I'm saying it's, like, an echo chamber. Designed to make a few people feel very important and, um, sell more entries next year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I just think you're being overly cynical. The scale alone suggests there's something real there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I just think you're being overly cynical. The scale alone suggests there's something real there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Or a really good marketing department. Come on.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or a really good marketing department. Come on.
